授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to acquire vocabulary and grammar necessary for communication in English and to improve their conversation skills.
到達目標: 1. Able to grasp the complex flow of an argument when the topic is familiar. 2. Able to read documents and references on familiar topics without the use of a dictionary, find the necessary information, and write cohesive essays and reports using complex sentence structures. 3. Able to make fluent presentations by clearly stating one's own opinions and developing arguments.
授業方法: The teacher will explain the details of the knowledge, focusing on the textbook. There may be pair and group discussions. There will be oral presentations and short tests. Students will be called on during class, so please prepare and review before coming to class.
